ul.li: The groom usually comes in a grand procession to the wedding hall, and is greeted by the bride's family. Traditionally, this is an occasion for everyone in the community to confirm that the groom is a good guy. Thanks for having the bride's back, guys
There's a second engagement ceremony. The couple (ok lets be honest, the couples' parents) re-confirm that they want to go through with the wedding.

br.hr:
Kaasi Yatra/Oonjal/Muhurtham - July 9th, 2014 9-10:30AM Highlights:
FOOD
The groom pretends to walk away to pursue a life as a hermit. He walks about 25 steps and then changes his mind, at the request of the bride's father
The couple sit on a swing and listen to maami's sing
The main ceremony
The bride and groom pretend to be 5 year olds and play with coconuts.
FOOD
Reception - July 9th, 2014 6:00PM onwards Highlights:
Hordes of people stand in line to take a picture with the couple
FOOD
Party in Seattle - August 16th, 2014 6:30PM onwards Highlights:
FOOD
